Hiruzen [[summons]] Enma to slash the opponent with his claws until he launches them into the air. He then dives onto them and transforms into a [[Transformation: Adamantine Staff|staff]] that Hiruzen uses to slam the opponent into the ground from midair.

[[es:Invocación de Enma: Vals de Trueno]]
[[pl:Enma Kuchiyose ~ Kongō Enbu]]
